alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 04 at 3:07AM PST until March 06 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM SATURDAY TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations: valleys can expect 2 to 7 inches with mountains receiving 6 to 12 inches. Locally higher amounts are possible. * WHERE...Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range, White Pine County, Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County, Northwestern Nye County and Northeastern Nye County. * WHEN...From 1 AM Saturday to 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions in the advisory area. Travel across some of the higher passes and summits, especially along the US 50 corridor including Austin, Hickison, and Pinto Summits and Sacramento Pass could be difficult. Please allow for extra travel time to arrive to your destination safely.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County
